title: I'll Find My Happily Ever After With The Smothering Love Of The Yandere Nobleman - Anthology
alternative_title: ヤンデレ貴公子の重すぎる愛で幸せになります！　アンソロジー
status: ヤンデレ貴公子の重すぎる愛で幸せになります！　アンソロジー
description:
Description :
        An anthology of Isekai x yandere x cinderella stories. Persecuted young ladies find themselves bewitched and obsessively loved by mysterious noblemen…! Dukes, a prince, and a promising childhood friend - the overwhelming devotion of these noblemen completely turn the tides when least expected! A collection of four thrilling love stories where innocent young ladies are sweetly ensnared:  “After I Handed Over My Fiancé to My Little Sister, I Was Met with the Obsession of the Reclusive Duke” by Shiwori Hiromoto “Despite Being Cursed, the Young Lady is Doted on by the Lonely Prince” by Rito Yanagi “Flowers and Love Dedicated to You ~ The Story of a Certain Fallen Young Lady and the Next Duke” by Rirako Kabashima “The Poor Young Lady Is Blind to the Duke’s Affection” by Inaru

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: After I Handed Over My Fiancé To My Little Sister, I Was Met With The Obsession Of The Reclusive Duke
